Description: Your hat. Anypony who sees it will know that they're dealing with a magnificent magician. Good for keeping the sun out of your eyes, too.
Your cape. Anypony who sees it will know that they're dealing with a magnificent magician. Keeps you warm during travels, too.
A wooden crate for putting things in.
It's a rock. You saw enough of them during your time on the rock farm.
Fragrant and delicious, just the thing for a quick snack.
A piece of farming equipment used by earth ponies. You've done enough farming in your life already.
A spool of blue thread. Rarity probably won't miss it.
This outfit is clearly far from complete, unless Rarity's fashion standards have changed very dramatically in the last week.
A bucket of chocolate-chip ice cream. You're certain you've earned yourself a treat today.
A bunch of magical fireworks, crafted by yours truly. Handle with care!.
